statements: UPDATE analytics_data SET event_type = 'login', event_timestamp = '2022-09-30 15:30:00' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE analytics_data SET user_id = 10, event_description = 'Clicked on the homepage banner' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE analytics_data SET event_type='login', event_description='User logged in' WHERE user_id=123 AND id=1;
UPDATE analytics_data SET event_description='User made a purchase', event_timestamp='2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id=456 AND event_type='purchase';
UPDATE analytics_data SET event_value = 20 WHERE user_id = 'd3f3901d-2e6b-4947-8621-963a9d3e2e22';
UPDATE user_profile SET email = 'johndoe@example.com', age = 35 WHERE user_id = '9153e3bf-7c7e-48c8-8cea-3bb2b3c1d6f5';
UPDATE analytics_data SET event_description = 'Logged In', event_value = 1 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profile SET age = 30, email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='John Doe', customer_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount=1500.50, order_date='2022-05-20' WHERE order_id=100;
UPDATE customers SET customer_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = 150.50, order_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE order_id = 201;
UPDATE large_datasets SET dataset_name = 'Updated Dataset 1' WHERE dataset_id = 1;
UPDATE analytics_results SET result_value = 15.75 WHERE result_id = 3;
UPDATE large_datasets SET dataset_size = 5000 WHERE dataset_id = 1
UPDATE analytics_results SET result_description = 'Updated result' WHERE result_id = 10
UPDATE Sales SET total_amount = total_amount + 10 WHERE sale_id = 12345;
UPDATE Customers SET city = 'New York', country = 'USA' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE Sales SET quantity = 10, total_amount = total_amount + 100 WHERE sale_id = 123;
UPDATE Products SET price = price * 1.1, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 456;
